special_text:
Mykian, Planetrotter enters with an additional loyalty counter for each color of mana spent to cast him.
[+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control. If that creature had no +1/+1 counters on it, draw a card.
[-7]: You get an emblem with “Creatures you control have ‘Remove a counter from this creature: Draw a card.'”
rules_text2:
[i](You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)[/i]
You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. If you do, put a flying counter, a hexproof counter, a lifelink counter, a first strike counter, and a vigilance counter on it.
